verses.verse: A <S%H7892>Song<s%> of <S%H4609>degrees<s%>. Many a <S%H7227>time<s%> have they <S%H6887>afflicted<s%> me from my <S%H5271>youth<s%>, may <S%H3478>Israel<s%> now <S%H559>say<s%>: Many: or, Much
Many a <S%H7227>time<s%> have they <S%H6887>afflicted<s%> me from my <S%H5271>youth<s%>: yet they have not <S%H3201>prevailed<s%> against me. Many: or, Much
The <S%H2790>plowers<s%> <S%H2790>plowed<s%> upon my <S%H1354>back<s%>: they made <S%H748>long<s%> their <S%H4618>furrows<s%> <S%H4618><s%>.
The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is <S%H6662>righteous<s%>: he hath cut <S%H7112>asunder<s%> the <S%H5688>cords<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%>.
Let them all be <S%H954>confounded<s%> and <S%H5472>turned<s%> <S%H268>back<s%> that <S%H8130>hate<s%> <S%H6726>Zion<s%>.
Let them be as the <S%H2682>grass<s%> upon the <S%H1406>housetops<s%>, which <S%H3001>withereth<s%> <S%H6927>afore<s%> it groweth <S%H8025>up<s%>:
Wherewith the <S%H7114>mower<s%> <S%H4390>filleth<s%> not his <S%H3709>hand<s%>; nor he that bindeth <S%H6014>sheaves<s%> his <S%H2683>bosom<s%>.
Neither do they which go <S%H5674>by<s%> <S%H559>say<s%>, The <S%H1293>blessing<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> be upon you: we <S%H1288>bless<s%> you in the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.
